scripts.sass: npm run sass:bs && npm run sass:main && npm run sass:member && npm run sass:admin && npm run sass:promotions && npm run sass:error
scripts.purge:bs: purgecss --css ./public/css/bootstrap.css --content ./**/*.pug --output ./public/css -v -s container-lg d-inline-block d-block d-flex position-relative position-absolute border border-white border-1 flex-column justify-content-center justify-content-between align-items-center m-0 mx-1 mx-2 mx-3 mx-auto mt-3 me-1 me-2 me-3 mb-5 ms-2 ms-auto p-0 p-1 p-2 p-4 px-1 px-2 px-4 py-1 pe-4 pe-5 pb-1 ps-3 ps-5 font-monospace fs-5 fs-6 fs-7 fs-8 fw-bold fw-bolder text-start text-center text-capitalize text-nowrap text-secondary text-white bg-opacity-50 rounded rounded-top rounded-bottom text-bg-dark
scripts.build: npm run sass && npm run purge:bs && npm run babel
